Dead By Daylight: Pleasure AND Pain...

DBD is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game with multiple popular licenses diversifying and expanding its generally awesome roster of killers and survivors. This idea is aided by perks, which switch up and change the gameplay experienced. However, despite an overall fun experience, there are several key issues.

1) Perks - Perks such as Dead Hard and Decisive Strike belonged to a meta in which playing Killer became much more miserable to get through, thus leading to a drop in Killers. Some would argue that playing as the Killer is supposed to leave the player in a more powerful position, but in the majority of games, Killers would be bullied by meta-perk use, making each match chore-like and not fun. NOTE: BHVR has changed many perks to improve the experience of the game.

2) Solo-Queue - As with the majority of multiplayer games, it always sucks to be placed into teams which don't match your skill level, and it is increasingly prevalent here. Sometimes, Killers have thousands of hours and are up against brand-new survivors or vice-versa. Playing with randoms in this game isn't great, however the game does shine when playing with friends.

3) Toxicity - It would be unfair to focus on DBD as one of the most toxic gaming communities since franchises like Call Of Duty are known to be hostile, however there is a strong likelihood of players experiencing varying levels of hostility when playing. From messages in the lobby to general 'toxic' tactics, DBD is known to be fairly toxic from day-to-day. Be prepared to face this when playing.

4) Hacking - As BHVR's anti-cheat software, to my knowledge, isn't well-protected, there is a fair likelihood of you experiencing hacking within the game, with cheating software often being abused to allow players easy wins or just to be toxic. 

It's a decent game, but be weary of these issues when playing. Based on my experiences of the game, I'd give it a 7/10? But these issues stop my score from going much higher. I'd recommend buying and playing the game when it's cheaper and trying it for a while.

映画ハロウィンのファンで、コラボキャラクターとして登場していると知り、購入しました。(版権のため、学術書やスキンなどに恩恵がないのは残念ですが、マイケルとローリーが存在している&操作出来るというだけで嬉しいです)
ランクや貰えるBPはもちろん励みになりますが、一番は儀式内での自身の立ち回りを試行錯誤しながらプレイするのが楽しいと感じます。このようなマルチプレイは自分ではまず絶対に選ばない(遊ばない)ゲームでしたが、こんなにハマるとは思いませんでした。殺人鬼・生存者それぞれがどのような人間なのか(だったのか)、儀式の合間にストーリーを読み進めるのも楽しみの一つです。開放出来ていないものが多いけど…
元々はSwitch版でプレイを始めたので、将来的にクロスプログレッション機能が追加されれば大変嬉しいです。よろしくお願いいたします。

Még anno az 1.9-es patchektől játszottam vele egészen a 2.x patchig a másik profilomon. Jó játék, ha belejössz egyedül is tudsz játszani vele. Azt kell mondjam hogy a játék atmoszféráját amiből kiindult, teljesen lerombolták, ami nekem nem annyira jön be, mivel az új gyilkosokat nehéz kikerülni, mondhatni túl OP-k, nem nagyon illenek bele a játékba. A túlélős meccseim 85%ban mindig én maradok utoljára mivel a többiek a gyengébb játéktudásukkal mindig korábban meghalnak, és olyan alapvető dolgokat nem csinálnak, mint pl a Hag gyilkosnak a csapdáinál nem guggolnak, ezzel riasztják a gyilkost. Gyilkosként pedig túl könnyű játszani. A túlélők próbálnak Ochido-k lenni egyedül, de sosem jön nekik össze. Ha már legalább ketten vagytok barátok akik játszotok, akkor már viszonylag kiegyensúlyozott tud lenni a játékmenet. Mind gyilkossal mind túlélővel szoktam játszani, összességében ; Nem rossz, csak nekem ez a Dead by Daylight nem ugyanaz a Dead by Daylight mint régen volt.

"Iridescent rank 1 survivor point of view at the time of writing" Wouldn't recommend since the killers in the game are utterly broken and over powered. its hard to find the game entertaining most of the time. Patch 6.1.0 has made the game extremely worse. Killers now face camp you on hooks. tunnel you down until you're 100-0 and out of a match in seconds once a match has just started and yet the devs think they're not strong enough.....Killers also move way to fast and recover after attacks way to quickly making sure there is no chases at all. Once again.. I wouldn't recommend this game to anyone, not until the killers are MORE balanced. after they become more balanced ill update this review. :)

I enjoy this game and I want to see it do well, but I can't recommend a game where the devs don't take a very harsh stance against cheaters:
- If a blatant cheater (flying, insta-heals etc) regularly plays with 3 other people who aren't cheating, you need to ban all 4. Banning the 1 cheater just results in all 4 chipping in for a new account and then reaping the benefits of free wins on the 3 non-cheater accounts. 
- It also seems the devs also won't ban more subtle cheats like 5-20% movespeed increases, as I reported someone who was clearly speedhacking by a small amount like 10-15% but they remain unbanned even after providing video proof.

You may see my hours increase and this is because it's still fun to play if you go into custom games with your friends or are lucky enough to not be matched against cheaters.

May god have mercy on your soul if you play on the asia servers though.
